Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.event

Interface EditorMouseMotionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditorMouseMotionAdapter, FoldingPopupManager, SubstitutionShortInfoHandler, ValueLookupManager

    public interface EditorMouseMotionListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Allows to receive notifications about mouse movement in the editor.
    See Also:
    Editor.addEditorMouseMotionListener(EditorMouseMotionListener), EditorEventMulticaster.addEditorMouseMotionListener(EditorMouseMotionListener, Disposable), EditorMouseListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void mouseDragged(EditorMouseEvent e)
      Called when the mouse is moved over the editor and a mouse button is pressed.
      default void mouseMoved(EditorMouseEvent e)
      Called when the mouse is moved over the editor and no mouse buttons are pressed.

    • Method Detail

      • mouseMoved

        default void mouseMoved(EditorMouseEvent e)
        Called when the mouse is moved over the editor and no mouse buttons are pressed.
        Parameters:
        e - the event containing information about the mouse movement.

      • mouseDragged

        default void mouseDragged(EditorMouseEvent e)
        Called when the mouse is moved over the editor and a mouse button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        e - the event containing information about the mouse movement.
